definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition

sentences.english: The Qing dynasty vases had been displayed on the window sill for years.
sentences.chinese: 这些清代花瓶已经在展台上展出了很长时间。

sentences.english: Hua Hong NEC's booth attracted and impressed many visitors.
sentences.chinese: 华虹NEC新颖别致的展台吸引了众多参观者。

sentences.english: Allocation of the booth location and advertisement placement will be on a first-come-first-served basis.
sentences.chinese: 展台位置及刊登广告申请按先到先得原则分配。

sentences.english: Lynk and Zelda had an grand presence at the booth.
sentences.chinese: 林克和塞尔达有一个在展台隆重的存在。

sentences.english: That requires a demo account with a password known to the entire booth staff.
sentences.chinese: 这需要所有展台工作人员都知道的演示帐号和密码。

sentences.english: Negotiate with the administration how many tables and chairs are required at the booth.
sentences.chinese: 与展会管理方谈判在展台所需的桌椅数量。

sentences.english: Many models hope to work on the catwalk some day.
sentences.chinese: 很多模特儿都希望有一天能走上伸展台。

sentences.english: And what kind of information will you want to deliver to the public from your exhibition?
sentences.chinese: 展台搭建上想向业界传达什么信息？

sentences.english: The "Company Name" will be used to produce fascia board.
sentences.chinese: 公司名称将用于制作展台楣板。

sentences.english: Please ensure that there will be enough power splitters at the booth so the machines will actually be able to be turned on.
sentences.chinese: 请确保展台有足够功率的配电箱，能够让机器运行。

sentences.english: Construction operations must strict be abided by the planar graph approved by the firefighting department .
sentences.chinese: 展台搭建单位应依据消防管理部门批准的平面图施工。

sentences.english: Deadline of applying two-storey stand is 1 September 2009.
sentences.chinese: 搭建双层展台截止申请日期为2009年9月1日。

sentences.english: The pillars of the Huntsman stand were made using an infusion process.
sentences.chinese: 亨斯曼展台的台柱是通过灌注工艺制成的。

sentences.english: If you are selling stuff, you should not emphasize on making money at the booth.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在展台卖东西，你不应该把重点放在赚钱上。

sentences.english: OK, bring all the models out on the runway.
sentences.chinese: 好，把所有的模特儿带到伸展台来。

definition: relative position of exhibition booth/allocated floor space for display stall/allotted exhibit area
to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
meeting place/place where people gather/CL:個|个[ge4]
to put on display/to be on show/to exhibit
to display and sell (e.g. at a fair)/sales exhibition
